thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Stay
thread.title_full: Nice Stay - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PM20
title: Nice Stay
text:
Stayed here for 2 nights in March, check I'm was smooth and got access to our room early, room was well appointed typical premier inn size, room was clean and good size. This hotel hasn't been upgraded so still the older purple decor but still in good condition. Staff friendly and helpful. Only negative was the quality of the TV in the room was poor however we weren't in the room much so didn't affect us.
Would stay again
